string.value: A Way to Fight Off Sleep

I met with #b#p1040001##k. #b#p1040001##k says he can't stand guard at the dungeon entrance because he keeps falling asleep. If this continues, something bad is bound to happen. I need to find a potion that can fight off sleepiness and give it to #b#p1040001##k.

#i02000000##t02000000# #b#c02000000#/1
#k#i02000001##t02000001# #b#c02000001#/1
#k#i02000002##t02000002# #b#c02000002#/1#k
#k#i02000003##t02000003# #b#c02000003#/1#k
I fed the potion to #b#p1040001##k but it was no use. But #b#p1040001##k was very appreciative of my efforts.

...Snore~ Ahh! Was I dozing off again? I'm so tired these days, I can hardly stay awake at work. Stop looking at me like that. It's probably hard for you to understand but try staying under this warm sunlight all day...
I want to stop dozing off and do my job right, protecting this place, but I don't know how to keep myself from falling asleep. Do you think you can help me?
Once #b#p1022000##k told me that if the mind and body are both healthy, they can fight off sleep. I guess I should be eating something that's good for my body but I don't know what to eat exactly.
I trust you to discern and bring me things you think will be good for me. If you are a great adventurer, I'm sure you're familiar with various items and their effects.
You don't see the dungeon entrance? I have a sacred responsibility to protect this entrance. If I keep falling asleep, anyone will try to enter this dangerous place. Are you okay with that?
...Snore~ Oh! It's you! You really must be a great adventurer. I didn't think you'd be back so soon. Why don't you start giving me one potion at a time? I'm sure I'll find one that will work.
I've tried every single one of them... but I don't feel any different. Don't worry though. I won't forget everything you've done for me. Plus, you never know...
Maybe the effects will kick in later. That's usually how medicine works, right? It's supposed to heal me right away? Haha! I don't know about that... It's not like this is a video game or something.
...Snore~ Oh no! I fell asleep again. Hey, you didn't find me a cure yet?
